colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B ('DI MKHAS GRUB RJE'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG 'BREL BA 'BYUNG NA DANG, ,DE MIN DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA DANG 'BREL BA BYED NA DMIGS BRTZE MA'I MJUG MKHAS GRUB RIN PO CHE'I BSTOD PA, GZHUNG LUGS RAL PA 'THUG POS GNYA' KHEBS SHING, ZHES PA CI MAD 'DREN ZHING DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MA'I MJUG TU GSOL 'DEBS GTON RDZES SMON LAM 'DI KHA BTAB KYANG 'THUS PA NI GONG DU NYER BSDU RAB 'BYAMS @008A *, ,PA'I MKHAS GRUB RJE RANG LA ZHUGS PA YIN PAS KHYAD MED PHEBS BYUNG, SMON LAM 'DI BKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I GSUNG BKA' RGYA MA YIN, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
